body.p: The following is a list of requirements for the controlled vocabularies that are used in this application profile as controlled list of values.

ul.li: Be published under an open licence.
Be operated and/or maintained by an institution of the European Union, by a recognised standards organisation or another trusted organisation.
Have labels in multiple languages, ideally in all official languages of the European Union.

Have terms that are identified by dereferenceableDereferencing HTTP URIs. https://www.w3.org/2001/tag/doc/httpRange-14/2007-05-31/HttpRange-14 URIs with each URI resolving to descriptions about the term.
Have associated persistence and versioning policies.

body.p: These criteria have been applied to select controlled vocabularies used in this application profile.
